name: Neuron SEO
author: Neuron Expert

sections.description:
The plugin enables the publication of SEO-optimized articles for your blog, created using the AI platform Neuron Expert.

This plugin relies on the Neuron Expert API service.

For more information about the Neuron Expert service, please visit:
– Neuron Expert
– Privacy Policy
– Terms and Conditions

Getting Started

To set up and start using the Neuron SEO plugin on your WordPress site, follow the detailed steps below:

  1. Obtain your API Key:

    • Visit the Neuron Expert website: neuron.expert and log in to your account.
    • Once logged in, navigate to the settings by clicking on your profile or the settings icon.
    • Go to the “Connections” section within the settings.
    • Find the “WordPress Plugin” option and click on it to reveal your unique API key. This key is necessary for the Neuron SEO plugin to communicate with the Neuron Expert service.

  2. Configure the Neuron SEO Plugin:

    • Within your WordPress dashboard, go to the Neuron SEO plugin settings.
    • Enter the API key you obtained from the Neuron Expert website into the designated field.
    • Save your changes to ensure the plugin is correctly configured and ready to use.

  3. Using the Plugin:

    • To display your posts, add the shortcode [neuron_display_user_posts] to the page where you want your posts to appear on your WordPress site.
    • Make sure to place the shortcode in the WordPress editor where you’d like your content to be displayed.

Remember to keep your API key confidential to protect your account’s security. Do not share your API key publicly.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the neuron-posts folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
How do I obtain an API key?

To obtain an API key, follow the steps outlined in the “Getting Started” section. You will need to log in to your account on Neuron Expert, access the “Connections” section in the settings, and locate the “WordPress Plugin” option to find your API key.

short_description:
This plugin relies on the Neuron Expert API service.

A Neuron Expert WordPress plugin to display user posts.
